params._tokenId: The ID of the token to claim.
params.proof: The Merkle proof to verify the claim.

returns._0: True if the user is eligible to claim, false otherwise.

params._tokenId: The ID of the token to claim.
params.proof: The Merkle proof to verify the claim.

params._merkleRoot: The Merkle root of the airdrop.
params._timeForClaim: The time until which claims are allowed.

airdropChecker(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Checks if the user is eligible to claim an NFT based on a Merkle proof.

claim(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Allows a user to claim an NFT based on a Merkle proof.

deposit(uint256[]).notice: Allows the owner to deposit NFTs into the contract.

getInitData(address,address,bytes32,uint.notice: Returns the ABI-encoded initialization data for the contract.

recoverUnclaimed(uint256[]).notice: Allows the owner to recover unclaimed NFTs after the claim period has expired.
